sub_fields.label: Heading Bold

The bold part of heading

To hide it, just fill that field with a space

sub_fields.label: Currency Symbol Placement
sub_fields.name: currency_symbol_placement
sub_fields.instructions:
Default value: "Before"
Example of a formatted string (Before): "$100"
Example of a formatted string (after): "100$"
